snippet.title: Kirby: Battle Royale - Reveal Trailer - Nintendo 3DS - Nintendo Direct 9.13.2017
snippet.description:
Kirby is about to enter a tournament against his toughest rival yet… himself! Find out more in this sneak peek at this upcoming Kirby title releasing January 19th, 2018!

#Nintendo3DS #KirbyBattleRoyale

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun! https://goo.gl/HYYsot

Visit Nintendo.com for all the latest! http://www.nintendo.com
